scenes.title: Introduction
scenes.narration_summary: Hook with color dimension paradox, introduce perceptual efficiency metric and Markov polytope

scenes.title: The Color Dimension Problem
scenes.narration_summary: Contrast human trichromacy vs mantis shrimp dodecachromacy, introduce opponent processing vs interval decoding dichotomy

scenes.title: The Markov Polytope Framework
scenes.narration_summary: Explain Hoffman's conscious-agent formalism, qualia kernels, and how polytope dimension measures experiential complexity

scenes.title: Defining Perceptual Efficiency
scenes.narration_summary: Define η = B/D(k), explain interpretation of high vs low efficiency, connect to polytope geometry

scenes.title: Empirical Data Across Species
scenes.narration_summary: Present data table of 6 species, show inverse scaling relationship, discuss statistical fit

scenes.title: Two Regimes of Color Processing
scenes.narration_summary: Explain cortical amplification vs interval decoding regimes, link to resource constraints and neural scaling

scenes.title: Falsifiable Predictions
scenes.narration_summary: Outline key predictions for tetrachromacy, synthetic sensors, and cross-species scaling

scenes.title: Conclusion and Implications
scenes.narration_summary: Recap the polytope compression hypothesis, emphasize bridge between consciousness theory and sensory ecology
